author: Vivek Narayanan
text:
Celebration by AIADMK cadre following a party meeting went awry when an airborne cracker misfired, injuring one person and damaging a car and window panes at an apartment complex on Ponniamman Kovil Street at Kotturpuram on Saturday evening

State Minister for Social Welfare B. Valarmathi had taken part in the meet. The apartments are situated 100 feet away from the venue.

According to the police, the injured, Jaya Kumar (40), a resident of Kannan Garden, was taking bath at his ground floor apartment when the explosion damaged the window panes and shards of glass pierced his neck and ear. He is undergoing treatment at a private hospital in Nandanam.
title: Cracker blast at AIADMK meeting injures resident
